description:
InfraHire is looking for Logistics/ warehouse manager ( Bilingual Chinese- English) in Vernon, CA.

Responsibilities

  • Maintain receiving, warehousing, RMA and outbound operations for airfreight and LTL volumes by initiating, coordinating, and enforcing program, operational, and personnel policies and procedures. Develop and implement warehouse SOP.
  • Comply with federal, state and local warehousing, material handling, and shipping requirement by studying existing and new legislation, enforcing adherence to requirements, advising management on needed actions.
  • Continuously improve operational performance and efficiency while satisfying both company and customer needs.
  • Maintain warehouse staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees in cooperation with HR.
  • Maintain physical condition of warehouse by planning and implementing new design layouts including automated sorting machinery, inspecting equipment, issuing work orders for repair and requisitions for replacement.
  • Achieve financial objectives by preparing and annual budget, scheduling expenditures, analyzing variances, initiating corrective actions, report to management.

Requirements

  • Minimum 4 years operation and management experience in warehouse/distribution center.
  • Bilingual in Chinese and English
  • Strong knowledge of distribution center procedures, including analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong administrative and organizational skills with the ability to drive results.
  • Ability to be flexible to work variable shifts, including weekends and operate on tight deadlines with multiple priorities subject to frequent change.

InfraHire is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
